main event: A sighting of one flying disc was reported over Little Rock, Arkansas on 25 February 1949.
interesting points: Witnesses described the object as flat and round with a diameter of 30 to 50 feet., The object was highly maneuverable, appearing to stop and reverse direction several times., Witnesses reported no sound from the object., An estimated altitude of 10,000 to 12,000 feet was given for the disk., A vertical beam of light was observed extending from the object to the ground.
witness description: Three witnesses including a contractor, a housewife, and another relative, all from Little Rock.
